content: S3.7b.1: Managed signer from env/KMS (replace generated keypair)
S3.7b.2: Helius webhook auth enforcement (secret verification + retry)
S3.7b.3: Bybit funding interval from instruments-info API
S3.7b.4: Guard timeout increase to 15-45s jittered + fail-closed
S3.6: Build manual-sign fallback for non-delegated orders
S3.8: E2E testing on devnet - full flow validation
S3.9: E2E testing on mainnet - tiny size validation
S3.10: Kill-switch enhancement - cancel + pause consumption
